text: C. Virginia Fields (born August 6, 1945) is an American politician. She is the former Borough President of Manhattan, elected in 1997 and reelected in 2001. Her second term expired at the end of 2005. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Birmingham, Alabama Category:Manhattan borough presidents Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: C. Virginia Fields
